Text.content:
All gradle tasks can be executed using the Gradle wrapper shipped with OpenCms and with one of the available wrapper scripts:

  • Linux: ./gradlew <task>
  • Windows: graldew.bat <task>

Text.content: The task builds the .zip-archive as it is downloaded when getting the OpenCms release for installation.

Text.content: The task builds the opencms.war file as deployed to the servlet container.

Text.content: The task builds the .zip file for the respective module, as you use it for module import.
